title: T206 Mixed Backs including Red and Brown Hindu
author: edjs

posts.post_title: T206 Mixed Backs including Red and Brown Hindu
posts.post_content:
Hi guys, I'm looking to sell some of my tough to semi-tough backs. I have researched the population reports so you don't have to. The populations listed are for TOTAL population by PSA and SGC for that particular front/back combo.  They are displayed in parenthesis, the first one is PSA, the second is SGC (PSA)(SGC). Some of these are really tough, as the pop. report will show. I accept  PayPal, checks, and Money Order.  Prices are net to me, so please add 3%  for regular PayPal.  Please add $2.50 for shipping, free shipping on  orders of $150 or more, to include insurance.  Scans available on  request.

Kleinow, Sovereign 150, Raw, $45 (2)(9)
O'Neil, Sovereign 350, SGC 30, $55               (12) (9)
Willis, Sovereign 350, BVG 1, $40                  (3)           (5)
J. J. Clarke, Brown Hindu, SGC 20, $275         (5)          (7) "Buy the card not the holder"
Hinchman, Brown Hindu, SGC 10, $250          (5)          (8) "Buy the card not the holder"
Liebhardt, Brown Hindu, SGC 10, $200           (8)          (6)
Seymour, Polar Bear, BVG 2.5, $45 (38) (12)
Gray, Polar Bear, Raw, $40 (19) (16)
Batch, Polar Bear, SGC 40, $50 (25) (14)

Egan, Sovereign 350, Raw, [strike]$35[/strike]sold                     (13)         (8)
Rucker, Old Mill, Raw, [strike]$45[/strike]sold (13) (13)
Manning, Old Mill, SGC 10, [strike]$60[/strike]sold (6) (7)
Covaleski, Old Mill, Raw, [strike]$75[/strike]sold (3) (1)
Barbeau, Cycle 350, SGC 20, [strike]$45[/strike]sold (12) (10)
Manning, Polar Bear, SGC 40, $[strike]40[/strike]sold (21) (12)
Gasper, Tolstoi, SGC 30, [strike]$65[/strike]sold (3) (5)
Carrigan, Tolstoi, PSA 2, [strike]$60[/strike]sold (4) (7)
Tannehill, Red Hindu, PSA 1, [strike]$595[/strike]sold (10)         (2)
Congalton, Old Mill, SGC 50, $80 (23) (10)


PM, or e-mail with questions, a firm "I'll take it" will out do ongoing  negotiations.  Thanks for looking.
Do you have a clearer picture of the Willis?

Is the Tannehill Red Hindu still available? If so, I will take it.

I await your response.

Take Care Charlie
Still some left, make me an offer, you never know......
